rev.comment: /* Beauty pageants */ +Trump Brand, allegedly worth $3 bil.
rev.diff:
Line 150: Line 150:
In December 2006, [[talk show]] host [[Rosie O'Donnell]] criticized Trump's lenience toward Miss USA, [[Tara Conner]], who had violated pageant behavioral guidelines. This sparked a [[tabloid]] war between the two celebrities which lasted for several weeks thereafter.<ref name="People">{{cite news|author=Dagostino, Mark; Orloff, Brian|title=Rosie Slams Trump, The Donald Fires Back|work=[[People (magazine)|People]]|date=2006-12-20|accessdate=2007-07-07|url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20005103,00.html}}</ref><ref>[http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/16315762/ns/today-entertainment/ "War of words escalates between Trump, Rosie "], [[Associated Press]]/[[MSNBC]], December 21, 2006</ref><ref>Silverman, Stephen M. [http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20005940,00.html "Barbara Walters: I Don't Regret Hiring Rosie"], ''[[People (magazine)|People]]' magazine, January 3, 2007</ref><ref>Hall, Sarah. [http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/b54017_rosie_vs_donald_she_said_said.html "Rosie vs. Donald: She Said, He Said"], [[E! Online]], December 21, 2006</ref>
In December 2006, [[talk show]] host [[Rosie O'Donnell]] criticized Trump's lenience toward Miss USA, [[Tara Conner]], who had violated pageant behavioral guidelines. This sparked a [[tabloid]] war between the two celebrities which lasted for several weeks thereafter.<ref name="People">{{cite news|author=Dagostino, Mark; Orloff, Brian|title=Rosie Slams Trump, The Donald Fires Back|work=[[People (magazine)|People]]|date=2006-12-20|accessdate=2007-07-07|url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20005103,00.html}}</ref><ref>[http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/16315762/ns/today-entertainment/ "War of words escalates between Trump, Rosie "], [[Associated Press]]/[[MSNBC]], December 21, 2006</ref><ref>Silverman, Stephen M. [http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20005940,00.html "Barbara Walters: I Don't Regret Hiring Rosie"], ''[[People (magazine)|People]]' magazine, January 3, 2007</ref><ref>Hall, Sarah. [http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/b54017_rosie_vs_donald_she_said_said.html "Rosie vs. Donald: She Said, He Said"], [[E! Online]], December 21, 2006</ref>
  +   +
===The Trump Brand===
  +
Independent financial experts have estimated that the Trump [[Brand equity|Brand itself was valued]] at $200 Mil. Trump himself disputes this valuation, saying the brand is worth $3 Bil. <ref>[http://blogs.forbes.com/kerenblankfeld/2011/04/28/donald-trump-on-his-brand-value-forbes-numbers-are-ridiculous/]</ref>
